attributes.action: To create an offence of 'Fraud Whilst In Public Office'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the British People demand that people in government whom have knowingly illegally claimed allowances and /or expenses whilst in public office should face the full force of the law, as any member of the public would and be banned from holding public office in the future if found guilty.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/MP-Fraudsters/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
